TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 控制項的詳細資訊，毋需建立控制項的執行個體，就能顯示在 Web 組件控制項的目錄中。

span.span: Provides information about a control that you can display in a catalog of Web Parts controls without having to create an instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項會顯示目錄中的使用者可以加入至網頁的控制項，需要每個控制項的一些基本資訊。When controls are displayed in a catalog of controls that users can add to a page, some basic information about each control is required. 比方說，最好將標題控制項，以及描述，使得它們使用者在檢視類別目錄具有足夠的資訊來決定是否要將控制項新增至頁面。For example, it is useful to have a title for the control, and a description, so that as users view a catalog they have enough information to decide whether to add a control to the page. 不過，一份控制項可能包含許多控制項，並執行個體，它可能會影響應用程式的效能每必須建立控制項，以便擷取要顯示在目錄中的資訊。However, a catalog of controls can potentially contain many controls, and it could affect the performance of an application if an instance of every control must be created to extract the information to display in the catalog. 類別存在，因此不需要建立的執行個體擷取控制項的目錄中顯示控制項的相關資訊的控制項。The class exists so that it is not necessary to create an instance of a control to retrieve the information about the control that is displayed in a catalog of controls. 在 Web 組件控制項集合、物件也會搭配各種時的頁面是在目錄中的控制項顯示模式。In the Web Parts control set, a object is also used in conjunction with the various controls when a page is in catalog display mode. 類別具有其建構函式，另一個會採用兩個多載做為參數執行個體時可用的控制項 (建構函式)，和另一個會採用數個字串做為控制項的相關資訊參數 (建構函式)。The class has two overloads of its constructor, one that takes a control as a parameter when an instance is available (the constructor), and one that takes several strings with information about the control as parameters (the constructor). 類別也有數個設計成包含的描述資訊的屬性控制項。The class also has several properties designed to contain the description information for controls. 下表摘要說明屬性，以及每個哪些屬性會對應至在控制項。The following table summarizes the properties, and what property each one corresponds to in a control. |Description 屬性Description property|相關的組件控制項屬性Related part control property| |--------------------------|-----------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用類別。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the class. 一般情況下，主要由 Web 組件控制項集合中，使用這種類型，但這個程式碼範例只會顯示以程式設計方式的基本使用方式的主要的 description 屬性。Ordinarily, this type is used primarily by the Web Parts control set, but this code example is simply showing basic programmatic usage of the main description properties. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. - 自訂控制項。A custom control. - 以主控其他控制項的網頁。A Web page to host the other controls. - 在程式碼範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the code example works. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 如需使用者控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱主題[逐步解說： 在 Web 組件頁面上的變更顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about the user control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是自訂控制項。The second part of the code example is a custom control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例會使用動態編譯的方法。This code example uses the approach of dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 最上方是兩個`Register`指示詞： 一個使用者控制項，並註冊自訂其他註冊其原始程式檔位於您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中的控制項。Near the top are two `Register` directives: one that registers the user control, and the other to register the custom control whose source file is located in the App_Code folder of your site. 此頁面包含``項目，後者又包含兩個控制項的宣告式參考： 自訂控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`，以及Web 伺服器控制項，將會被視為控制項在執行時間，因為控制項將它與包裝物件。The page contains an `` element, which in turn contains declarative references to two controls: the custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, and a Web server control that will be treated as a control at run time because the control will wrap it with a object. 請注意，在程式碼`Button1_Click`方法，可用物件目錄中的控制項使用擷取方法，然後描述詳細資料會全部寫出至頁面。Note that in the code for the `Button1_Click` method, the available objects for the controls in the catalog are retrieved using the method, and then the description details are all written out to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**目錄**至目錄顯示模式變更的頁面。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to change the page to catalog display mode. 在目錄中，您應該會看到兩個控制項可加入至頁面。In the catalog, you should see the two controls that are available to be added to the page. 按一下 **列出 WebPartDescription 資訊**按鈕，然後出所有可用的值的程式碼寫入至頁面的物件。Click the **List WebPartDescription Information** button, and the code writes out the values of all available objects to the page. 此範例示範您可以擷取描述詳細資料，如而不需要建立控制項本身的執行個體的目錄中的控制項。This demonstrates that you can retrieve description details for controls in a catalog without having to create instances of the controls themselves.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 初始化包含特定 控制項資訊的新類別執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a specific control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載每個傳回的新執行個體的建構函式類別，其中包含特定資訊控制項。The overloads for the constructor each return a new instance of the class, which contains information about a specific control. 多載之間的差異是在其中建立新的執行個體的案例。The difference between the overloads is the scenario in which the new instance is created. 在某些情況下，當應用程式具有的可用執行個體控制項，建構函式使用。In some cases, when the application has an available instance of a control, the constructor is used. 當應用程式並沒有一個控制項執行個體，在此情況下透過匯入控制說明檔案時控制項，建構函式使用。When the application does not have a control instance, as is the case when a control description file is being imported through the control, the constructor is used.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 有 控制項執行個體可用時初始化新的類別執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class when a control instance is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式用來建立新物件會根據現有控制項。The constructor is used for creating a new object based on an existing control. 這個建構函式只會呼叫其他多載建構函式，在取得必要的參數值從屬性`part`參數。This constructor simply calls the other overload, the constructor, obtaining the required parameter values from properties on the `part` parameter.

exception.span: 的 屬性為 或空字串 ("")。

span.span: The property of is or an empty string ("").

summary.span: 使用包含 控制項描述資訊的數個字串初始化類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using several strings that contain description information for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式用來建立的新執行個體類別時控制項不提供。The constructor is used to create a new instance of the class when a control is not available. 例如，這就會發生的情況控制當匯入的描述檔案控制項。For example, this occurs in the case of an control when it imports a description file for a control. 它會取得建立所需的資訊直接從描述檔案中的物件和執行個體不存在。It gets the information it needs to create a object directly from the description file, and a instance is not present.

exception.span: 或 為 或空字串 ("")。

span.span: or is or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CatalogIconImageUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ CatalogIconImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 URL，其中包含至用做 控制項圖示影像的路徑。

span.span: Gets a URL containing the path to an image used as an icon for a control.

value.span: 包含 URL 的字串；預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: A string that contains a URL; the default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性直接對應至屬性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 如果該屬性上設定控制項，然後在對應的屬性物件也會有值。If that property is set on a control, then the property in the corresponding object will also have a value. 屬性適用於只有當頁面處於目錄顯示模式，和控制項顯示在控制項的目錄。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 如果在控制項中的屬性值指派給它的圖示，圖示會顯示在控制項旁邊目錄中。If the control has an icon assigned to it in the property value, the icon appears in the catalog next to the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行此程式碼範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼中`Button1_Click`Web 網頁的方法將示範如何取得的集合在目錄中使用的物件方法，然後顯示每個詳細資料類別目錄的迴圈中的控制項透過物件。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 請注意，下列程式碼擷取屬性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項的描述文字。

span.span: Gets the text of a description for a control.

value.span: 包含 控制項描述的字串；預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: A string that contains the description for a control; the default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性直接對應至屬性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 如果該屬性上設定控制項，然後在對應的屬性物件也會有值。If that property is set on a control, then the property in the corresponding object will also have a value. 屬性適用於只有當頁面處於目錄顯示模式，和控制項顯示在控制項的目錄。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 如果控制項具有指派給它的描述，描述會出現在類別目錄做為工具提示控制項。If the control has a description assigned to it, the description appears in the catalog as a ToolTip on the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行此程式碼範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼中`Button1_Click`Web 網頁的方法將示範如何取得的集合在目錄中使用的物件方法，然後顯示每個詳細資料類別目錄的迴圈中的控制項透過物件。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 請注意，下列程式碼擷取屬性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得相對應 控制項的 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of a corresponding control.

value.span: 字串，包含控制項的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性不可以是`null`; 它必須永遠有一個值。The value of the property cannot be `null`; it must always have a value. 屬性直接對應至屬性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 屬性適用於只有當頁面處於目錄顯示模式，和控制項顯示在控制項的目錄。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行此程式碼範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼中`Button1_Click`Web 網頁的方法將示範如何取得的集合在目錄中使用的物件方法，然後顯示每個詳細資料類別目錄的迴圈中的控制項透過物件。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 請注意，下列程式碼擷取屬性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Title As String
public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得相對應 控制項的標題文字。

span.span: Gets the title text of a corresponding control.

value.span: 包含對應控制項標題的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the title of the corresponding control.

value.span: .NET Framework 會提供已計算字串做為預設值。

span.span: The default value is a calculated string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性直接對應至屬性。The value of the property corresponds directly to the property. 任何對應控制項具有為其屬性，其會成為的值屬性; 否則標題是計算的值。Whatever the corresponding control has for its property, that becomes the value of the property; otherwise, the title is a calculated value. 屬性適用於只有當頁面處於目錄顯示模式，和控制項顯示在控制項的目錄。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 任何標題會指派給控制項就會出現在目錄中的控制項旁邊。Whatever title is assigned to a control appears next to the control in the catalog. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行此程式碼範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼中`Button1_Click`Web 網頁的方法將示範如何取得的集合在目錄中使用的物件方法，然後顯示每個詳細資料類別目錄的迴圈中的控制項透過物件。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 請注意，下列程式碼擷取屬性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
